Class Seat

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.model.Seat
@Entity public class Seat extends Object
Represents a seat within a cinema hall. Each seat is identified by a row (letter) and a seat number within that row.

  • Constructor Summary

      number - The seat number within the row.
